text: Édith Scob (21 October 1937 – 26 June 2019) was a French actress. She was born in Paris. Scob was best known for her role as Christiane Génessier, the daughter with a disfigured face, in Eyes Without a Face (1960). Scob died on 26 June 2019 in Paris at the age of 81. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1937 births Category:2019 deaths Category:French movie actors Category:French television actors Category:French stage actors Category:Actors from Paris
title: Édith Scob
